ingredients.ingredient: 1 slice Buffalo sauce-flavored Monterey jack cheese

cookingTips: Slice apple thinly and immediately before assembly to prevent browning
Spread mustard evenly on both sides of roll for flavor distribution
Toast until cheese melts and roll is golden for best texture
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How should you prepare the apple to prevent browning, and what's the best way to toast this sandwich?
